Subject: Survey Analysis Results - Plymouth Heights Pastoral Search

Dear Committee Members,

The congregational survey analysis is complete. I've attached two documents:

1. QUICK_START.pdf - Read this first (5 min) to orient yourself
2. Executive Summary - The key findings (10 min read)

For those wanting deeper detail, the full Analysis Report (50 pages) is
available in the shared folder along with 16 data visualizations.

Please review the Executive Summary before our next meeting on [DATE].

Blessings,
[Your Name]
All files are small enough to email easily. Total attachment size well under typical email limits.
